text:
Marta Colaiocco (born 24 February 1984) is an Italian water polo player and coach. She was a member of the Italian women's national water polo team. She played at the 2011 FINA Women's Water Polo World League.
She coached for Firenze Waterpolo.

annotations.surface_form: Italian women's national water polo team
2011 FINA Women's Water Polo World League
